description: PWGSC, on behalf of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, is issuing this REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFP) for the acquisition of 2 motorized total mixed ration (TMR) mixing and distributing cart located in Sherbrooke, QC, as detailed in Annex Statement of Requirement.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Proposal: Motorized RTM Mixer and Dispenser Trolley

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC), invites interested bidders to submit a proposal for the acquisition of two motorized total mixed ration (TMR) mixing and distributing trolleys.

### Tender Details

- **Reference Number**: WS4289860988-Doc4343262876
- **Solicitation Number**: WS4289860988
- **Publication Date**: January 12, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: February 8, 2024, at 14:00 EST
- **Location**: Sherbrooke, Quebec, Canada
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **End-User Entity**: Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC)

### Equipment Specifications

The proposed equipment must meet the specification outlined in the Annex Statement of Requirement.

### Tender Evaluation Criteria

- The successful bidder will be selected based on the lowest price submitted

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contact Information

- **Contact Name**: Ly, Selina
- **Contact Email**: [selina.ly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:selina.ly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Notice URL

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18503038?extsite=MTg1MDMwMzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Date: January 12, 2024. This notice is issued in both English and French. The Government of Canada is an equal opportunities employer. Note: To access tender documents, please click on the provided link.

Please submit your proposal in writing to the contracting entity on or before 14:00 EST on February 8, 2024. Late submissions will not be accepted. The government reserves the right to accept or reject any or all bids. [1](Implementation of this
